website_summaries.verdict: If you favor performance over convenience and good looks, the natural and musical Klipsch SB 120 speaker stand is a decent buy.
pros: The Klipsch SB 120 offers a solidly constructed speaker base that sounds good with music and also offers detailed dialogue
It will decode Dolby Digital soundtracks and comfortably support TVs that weigh up to 100 pounds
It also supports streaming from Bluetooth devices
cons: The speaker lacks a display and it's almost impossible to know what the volume and bass levels are set to
the internal "subwoofer" doesn't offer much in the way of deep bass
"3D mode" offers no real soundstage improvement

customer_reviews.title: sound of tv speakers just as good
customer_reviews.text: what a piece of junk. the sound is no better than the speakers of the television i bought about 6 months ago (not a very expensive tv, either). at least with the tv, you get multiple presets for sound (movie, clear voice, etc). don't waste your money unless your tv has reallllly bad sound.
customer_reviews.author: Don V

customer_reviews.title: Sweet deal and Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this baby for an excellent deal at $200 instead of spending $500 something on their newest version of the soundbar. Made sense to just get this deal since it's only a minor facelift on the new edition. I highly recommend this. Expect to replace your tv speakers with a soundbar but don't expect a full on home theatre with bass and whatnot. It does sound a WHOLE LOT better than the tv speakers. This klipsch sb 120 also offers some bass to the room, but just not powerful. This is okay and what I expected because the whole main reason was to replace the tv speakers. Cant go wrong with a Klipsch quality sound and product.
customer_reviews.author: Kozzy17

customer_reviews.title: Good No Frills Unit.
customer_reviews.text: A good no frills unit with front vented woofers. Needs some level of dynamic volume control. Always turning to volume up and Down to compensate for unbalanced sound tracks and TV commercials. Speech comes through okay and overall sound, especially with music is fine. Would not have purchased if I had realized the limited number of inputs. Have already purchased an optical switcher, an analog switcher and a universal remote to help the system function more smoothly. The Klipsh is the only component that is difficult to work with my Harmony Universal Remote. I own a Yamaha sound bar that far exceeds the Klipsh in quality; however, at a much higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Jrh

customer_reviews.title: frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I want to love it. There is a high pitched hiss via bluetooth and via the audio adapter. It's great for rock and movies that have "walls of sound," but any audio which doesn't overshadow the electronic noise gets frustrating to listen to and I end up turning it off and switching to my UE boom. I should have sent it back when I had a chance. It's difficult to tell if it's from this unit or a design flaw. I have seen complaints on the internet regarding this. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: scomurr

customer_reviews.title: A good sounding system.
customer_reviews.text: All in all a good system, very good sound quality...but I had to return it. I had the unit for about three weeks when my kids and wife started telling me that the unit was making a high pitch squell while it was on. I guess I couldn't hear it because of my tinnitus. In any case, I couldn't have them suffering, so I returned the unit. If it wasn't for that, I'd still own the system.
customer_reviews.author: Habdad

customer_reviews.title: KLIPSCH SB120
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch SB120 Like others, I purchased to SB120 to eliminate the clutter of an old Dolby 5.1 with multiple speakers and subwoofer. The SB120 was easy to setup – optical out on TV to optical in the SB120. Programming remotes was a snap. The unit sounded flat with little bass. – I was disappointed. Then I decided to use the cable box optical output – switched from stereo to surround sound. Now the unit came alive – with full sound and bass (although you should not expect subwoofer quality bass from a sound bar). Unfortunately no optical out on the blu ray DVD player..............
customer_reviews.author: JHL

customer_reviews.title: you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: After much debate, I chose this over the Sony HTXT1. The Sony appears to have more technical features but I went with Klipsch based on my experience with their other products for sounds quality. What it lacks in technical options (only one optical connection, one analog), it makes up for in sound. My only other complaint is that I have not been able to sync the volume control to my Samsung remotes. It's plenty loud for our average sized den with a ten foot ceiling. If you are a Klipsch fan, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bok

customer_reviews.title: The Klipsch SB 120 -- Good sound
customer_reviews.text: A good sound base, large and heavy. I like the sound. Before you buy, make sure you have adequate space where you plan to put it --- it is L A R G E ! Plays well with my Harmony remote; however, getting it to work with my Samsung STB remote or my Samsung TV remote has been a challenge I have not been able to solve. Klipsch did open a problem for me; however, to date they have not responded beyond assigning a problem number. I am NOT thrilled with Klipsch support.
customer_reviews.author: John Borgoy

customer_reviews.title: Been wanting some good speakers for my flat screen tv for years and ...
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting some good speakers for my flat screen tv for years and tried a samsung, but it was better than the tv speakers, but not great. Read some reviews and decided to give this a try. Nice! Love the sound quality, so clear even at a lower volume level. Also liked the fact you can program your own remote to use instead of the little dinky one that comes with it. Works well with any Bluetooth devices as well, so can listen to music form laptop and it sounds fabulous. It is large, but the quality far outweighs that fact.
customer_reviews.author: Jill P.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 3 speaker Klipsch system with large floor speakers. I wanted a less cluttered look so I took a chance. I live in a condo so a full system with a sub is not such a great idea. This does the trick. I use my iPod to listen to classical and jazz. Sounds just as good as my old system even when I had a Sub in addition to a center speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical purchasing a "used" sound system but the price was right. Unfortunately, it came in a huge heavy package, and arrived on a raining day. The box was tattered and tore up. I was regretting my purchase. To my surprise, after opening the box, it was very well packaged, though you wouldn't know it by the delivery. I was able to set up the system in nothing flat, and was amazed by the sound. Awesome purchase, couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mittens

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice unit with great sound. It's compact, looks great and supports my 50" TCL easily. I had to sacrifice a surround system since we downsized our living arrangements and this 2 channel was the best way to go. I have not used the Bluetooth yet but will do so soon. I recommend this product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Haefeli

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performance
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and rated it Four Stars only because it does not have the ability to add a subwoofer. I am sitting next to a pair of Klipsch Forte' that are over 25 years old and still give me wonderful sound. So, I am a Klipsch consumer. This Klipsch SB 120 has wonderful sound and has delivered everything I could have wanted in a 2.1 system. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hit Man Hearne

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely great! I had a Bose solo in my living ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely great! I had a Bose solo in my living room which was acceptable but not great and bought this to replace that. I like that this will automatically awake from the sleep mode when I turn on the TV and also go to sleep mode a few minutes after the TV is turned off. The bose solo had to be turned on and off separately from the TV. The blue tooth is pretty cool to as i can send my itunes music to this sound box and i could not do that with my Bose. Anyone want to by a slightly used Bose solo???
customer_reviews.author: Jaychik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 42 inch Sony
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 42 inch Sony. Will be upgrading TV's soon and hope the base will accomadate the 65 inch screen. Sound/Bass are a perfect upgrade for those who want bigger sound but who do not want to deal with a home theater system (Ex. receiver, 5 speakers, sub)
customer_reviews.author: eric gomez

customer_reviews.title: As described and Delivered Quickly
customer_reviews.text: For an older style soundbar met our expectations. Sound quality was very good but item is a bit bulky as compared to newer designs
customer_reviews.author: Frank Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Still love it.
customer_reviews.text: After two years it's been relegated to bedroom duty. If you need more bass -- lower volume out on source and raise it on this unit. Still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Cox

customer_reviews.title: I truly enjoy listening to music at a very loud volume
customer_reviews.text: I use the speaker for both music and movies . I have found that it meets my needa for both. I truly enjoy listening to music at a very loud volume , this irritates my kids however . I am also a fan of heavy bass in my music and this provides for great volume and excellent bass response and such a small speaker . As a former radio disc jockey and electronics sales person I am very pleased with the performance of the speaker as compared to other speaker systems . The volume is more than enough for the living room where I use the speaker . It definitely provides a nice big sound for the size and purpose
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Amering

customer_reviews.title: great system.
customer_reviews.text: I tried the bose sound bar and sent it back. studied several others. most had small sound or terrible controls. the klipsh is awsome. it has a great full sound that is far superior to any tv and all other soundbar close to the same price. the remote control works great too. no flopping from one remote to another.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Works & sounds fantastic. I knew I would be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Works & sounds fantastic. I knew I would be disappointed, and I'm not. As a very long time owner of Klipsch Hereseys I have no problem recommending any of their audio equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Wahoo650

customer_reviews.title: Super sound
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. We are not techno savvy and had no trouble. Love the sound. It was easy to pair our Kindles with. It fits great under the tv. I like not having lots of speakers, but still having a clear, deep sound.
customer_reviews.author: Debable

customer_reviews.title: Little sound control possible.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a real sound mixer that included treble and bass. Basically I am running it at the bottom of the woofer output. Maybe should have considered a Bose more seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Leatherman

customer_reviews.title: good but not great
customer_reviews.text: good but not great. have a recollection of the great klipsch horns from a system that i had years ago--those blew me away. this not so much. it is sleek and delivers good sound. base is a little lacking. easy to use and hook up. seller was great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its ok But not great
customer_reviews.text: Appearance wise very bulky and square. Sound is fair much better than my Samsung speakers. There is not a LED screen telling you what mode your in only different colored lights. I have not used the Bluetooth feature as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Wichita

customer_reviews.title: Great audio
customer_reviews.text: Provides robust sound and easy to connect to TV. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald T. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a system that equalizes the sound from a ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a system that equalizes the sound from a show to commercials or that equalized movies from the sounds that go up and down making you have to watch anything with you hand. This isn't it! The music gets louder and your playing with the remote as much as your watching your tv
customer_reviews.author: DR.  B

customer_reviews.title: I'm more than satisfied. Klipsch is a reputable name in the industry ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how it compares to the Bose sounbar. I've heard them both but not side by side and not with the same audio material. For the price difference, though, I'm more than satisfied. Klipsch is a reputable name in the industry and did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Theriault

customer_reviews.title: ... base as I had hoped for but does sound great. Great for enhancing your T
customer_reviews.text: Not as much base as I had hoped for but does sound great. Great for enhancing your T.V. in smaller living rooms and apartments. Have to adjust the volume often depending on what your watching. Fairly heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Revised Review - Music sounds Great, Dialogue is not that clear - remote is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Revising my review. Music sounds good... Dialogue is not great. The remote, actually be the worst remote ever, and breaks down over 3 years. Super cheap and surprising that a $400-$500 sound system would come with a sub standard remote, I now have to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: And the price made it a good choice.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Without a sub woofer, it isn't deep and rich as some sound systems might be. But as a pedistal sound bar, it meets our expectations. And the price made it a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: tramborder

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is excellent. Sounds good at low volumes but even better louder. Lack of a display is annoying but not a deal killer for me. You get used it to like anything else especially if you read the manual. Bluetooth pairing is easy too. The unit is pretty big in size but not an issue for my setup.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa and Johan Swafford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an apartment or condo
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very simple, sound is incredible. But it's a Klipsch product so I would expect nothing less. Perfect for an apartment or condo, room filling rich sound without a bunch of wires to remote speakers. Combined with an 8-port HDMI switch, no need for a A/V amplifier switcher. Simple.
customer_reviews.author: Hare-otoko

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to handle our 50" Samsung  4K TV - an exact fit
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the width of the chrome base on my 50" Samsung 4K TV, so it raised it up nicely and provides great sound too. Bose and other boxes are much smaller, so they can't handle a TV that large.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Cellini

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound bar ! set up is a breeze I use this with my 65" LG and it will crank the sound without distortion perfect blend of speakers very solid unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jg 64

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sound bar
customer_reviews.text: My use of Klipsch goes back to my late 1970's DJ club days of using La Scalas in a small club, and at home Klipschhorns. There are 2 kinds of people in the world: Those who use Klipsch and those who don't. Overall, this is a really good sounding unit. It is larger and heavier than one would expect looking on-line. Set-up was simple. It would be nice if the unit had an optional subwoofer output (Klipsch engineers, think about it). For my purpose (bedroom), the lack of a subwoofer is fine. Being able to support up to a 100 pound monitor is another plus. Sound should be "heard", not "seen".
customer_reviews.author: CWB

customer_reviews.title: Good sound!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very good, installation was a snap and the unit raised my TV 3-1/2," improving the viewing angle!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Koebler

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Klipsch
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch never disappoints . Outstanding sound quality, and the bluetooth works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are straining to hear your television, this is a good solution to your problem.
customer_reviews.text: I can now hear my television! If you are looking for a high-end audio component, this is not for you. If you are straining to hear the dialogue on your television, this will definitely provide the solution you are looking for. The unit arrived promptly and was a snap to install.
customer_reviews.author: Brent in NY

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best decisions i have made so far in 2016
customer_reviews.text: after carefully reading and asking around about this product, i finally decided to buy it last week. This is one of the best decisions i have made so far in 2016, the bass is just enough not overbearing. The sound coming out of this bar is AMAZING, i also like the subwoofer control in the remote. Great product Klipsch, i am your newest fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :-(
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty disappointed. The highs sound good, and realizing there was not a seperate powered subwoofer I still expected a little more bass from the unit. Even turning the bass up the the highest level it is extremely faint. If I could go back I would have purchased a soundbar with a seperate subwoofer. A simple solution would be if the unit had a seperate subwoofer output where you could attach a powered subwoofer. If bass isn't an issue for you then I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: zxsport30

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Really simple to put it on duty. Nice sound. Excelent finish. Simple (very) to operate. Should improve bass sounds a little bit. Really like the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a winner. Bought 3 other brands Samsung- excellent quality and sound to difficult for my wife to run Bose- great suns no Bluetooth ZVOX- garbage all around This unit has great sound simple to operate for non tech people five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit. The bass isn't deep or tight at ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. The bass isn't deep or tight at all, but overall pretty good sound and unit for a small room. I use it in my gym room and it does a good job filling the room with decent sounding tunes from the tv or using bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmedur Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker for a great price
customer_reviews.text: System is solid. I had a bose solo 10 series ii before I returned it. This system based on the money sounds great and is very loud. Easy hook up. I have a 65 Samsung plasma TV that I wasn't able to use as a stand but still great speaker. I
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Really nice soundbar!
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a great choice for a bedroom TV. Much better sound quality than the TV's internal speakers. I would not hesitate to buy another one should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Very good speakers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The sound quality is very clear. The low frequency sound is very good. I use this for movies, TV and for listening to my music.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: looks great, sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I want it to do. Raises my Samsung TV up the 4 or 5" I needed, looks great, sounds great, was easy to set up. Bluetooth sounds really good (I rarely use my stereo anymore as it's just easier to tap my phone to Bluetooth and go). For the price, it's the best sound bar deal out there (I'd take it over my more expensive Polk 4000 any day)
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Hietpas

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully and has a higher volume than my regular flat ...
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully and has a higher volume than my regular flat screen TV. I now have my TV on mute and only use this sound system for sound. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LostShadow225

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: simple and nice sound, but the lack of display takes getting used to
customer_reviews.author: Justic23

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed. Made in China!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I purchased this item was the made in the U.S.A. claim in the details. It's very sad when you don't get what you pay for. It does have a good sound but I wish I would have went with the similar Sony. It sleeker with more features and would have matched my Sony TV. Buyer beware on this one, the description is a lie.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dotson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great on my TV stand, holds the TV maybe 2 or 3 inches higher, and it sounds great. Exactly what I wanted, and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: blackdout

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great when it works
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great when it works. Power shuts of every ten minutes or so. Also Vizio tv remote that is bluetooth won't control (not surprised, but that doesn't make me happy).
customer_reviews.author: Blah

customer_reviews.title: I miss it
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great until wife lost the remote and can't use it anymore. Has controls up front, but who gets up overtime to change settings.
customer_reviews.author: O. Family Account

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with the ease of installation and the quality of the sound - in compariosn to the built in speakers of the TV. I would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality! Easy to use. Only thing negative is the lack of volume display. This and a small smart tv have replace our stereo.
customer_reviews.author: dmlvernon

customer_reviews.title: good sounds , hard to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Main problem with unit is that the volume changes drastically for commercials and between each channel. Adjustments are by ear no visual. Could work better if I could have programed with by Viszo 55" TV. Still trying to program.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Fate

customer_reviews.title: in good condition. A good all around system
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time, in good condition. A good all around system. Bluetooth is nice for music on a tablet or smartphone. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.author: tim schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds way better than TV speakers. Simple setup, and TV stands right on top. Remote acts accurately and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kmiecik

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: Easy hook up. The sound is good not spectacular. It looks good and doesn't take up a lot of room. I thought the sound would be a little richer from all the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Fit my Application to a T. Little light on ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Application to a T. Little light on the Bass, but what would you expect from a 4" sub woofer
customer_reviews.author: James T Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt and exactly as described. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Verne

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I saw there was a few of these at refurbished price. Snagged one up immediately. First impressions when it came in where wow this thing is huge it's going to sound awesome! Plug it in, hook up optical to Xbox one and..... Disappointment ensues. No bass, muddy quality sound. Yes it gets loud. It will fill your house with no bass and muffled mids and highs. Seriously I have a $50 insignia soundbar that blows it out of the water and night and day difference in sound quality. I even blindfolded my girlfriend and made her listen to the two side by side. Klipsch should be ashamed of this, especially at a 400+ MSRP
customer_reviews.author: Nate S.

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable sound for a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son to replace his 5.1 Klipsch system. Very very impressed with the sound it puts out, and now his apartment is free of clutter!
customer_reviews.author: NG9

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, easy setup and use. Only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5, is that there is no display to show you volume setting.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Okula

customer_reviews.title: Great Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: This under the TV soundbar delivers that famous Klipsch "wall of sound" but also provides great highs and detailed mids. No worries about bass either. It goes deep. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound. If you have the money you should definitely add this to your flatscreen. Also doubles as a nice wireless bluetooth player
customer_reviews.author: Grant Rohman

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Cleans up a living room nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and sounds good. Have to turn up kind of loud to kick in any significant bass.
customer_reviews.author: Kadjaz

customer_reviews.title: This pedestal soundbar is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the quality of sound. This pedestal soundbar is perfect for my needs. Have a 70" Sharp Aquos resting on it and the rich sound now matches the size of the TV picture. Bluetooth works fine and have been able to stream satellite radio thru it on weekend mornings.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is a vast improvement over the stock speakers in my Samsung 32 inch flat screen TV. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. Doesn't take up a lot space as my ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Doesn't take up a lot space as my TV sits on top of it. The Bluetooth allows me to play music from my iPhone through it when I am not watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: George Sliney

customer_reviews.title: excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: excellent product... I can finally hear the tv and can blue tooth my Iphone through it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug C

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: For soundbars, it's the best one I have heard. Goes to sleep by itself. Price is right also.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Haines

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality sound. Loud enough for use in a large outdoor space.
customer_reviews.author: EsuNYC

customer_reviews.title: Great soundbar for a smaller space
customer_reviews.text: Great soundbar for a smaller space. Priced right. Good bass for a unit like this. Best Christmas present this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: big quality sound & easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: spectacular sound. super easy to set up. replaces a bunch of clutter. couldn't be happier with my purchase. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Smail

customer_reviews.title: ... this for our living room and the sound is great! Works perfect for our space and needs
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our living room and the sound is great! Works perfect for our space and needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ange L

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon purchase this year.
customer_reviews.text: Just outstanding sound (for fans of Klipsch sound) and works perfectly as the TV base. Best Amazon purchase this year.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: ALL I CAN SAY IS WOW !!!!!! I'd Buy another if it was available
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well with my TV. Could use a volume indicator
customer_reviews.author: renegade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds really good. I have a small-ish apartment and it really fills the room.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Muin

customer_reviews.title: Spunds and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound and looks great with my TV on top. I'm very picking about sound quality and I'm really impressed for a sound bar for around $200. I do recommend you use it for a few hours before you decide. Sounds better after the speakers have time to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Fender

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sound for price don't turn on amp anymore also bluetooth so can use iphone from anywhere in house
customer_reviews.author: earl davis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The remote is too small and gets lost but sounds great
customer_reviews.author: Dale H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, its big and heavy, has great sound, easy to use. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound (the classic Klipsch variety), unobtrusive - a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch still on top!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, quite sastisfied. Good sound for size of room, use it as a stereo via Bluetooth with my phone and Pandora.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Hadley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND. Dumb interface.
customer_reviews.text: Speaker sounds great for the price. Never will replace a true 5.1 / 7.1 etc.. The remote is 2/3 the size of a credit card. My Motorola DCX3400 cable box always admits a fiber optic signal even when off. So the speaker will keep turning itself on every couple hours.... That's annoying.! The speaker itself doesn't have any way to communicate what sound level its on. The fiber optic cable provided is short and cheap. Overall. The speaker is dumb but sounds great. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BabyJesus

customer_reviews.title: A good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The Klipsch SB 120 is a high quality sound system that greatly enhances the TV listening experience. The unit is solidly built and very easy to set up. The SB120 delivers sound that is full and crisp and it looks great under the television – certainly not obtrusive by any means. After setting up the sound system to our listening preference via the included remote, our TV remote was programmed to operate the volume and mute functions for the Klipsch SB 120 in about five minutes. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hankster

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for simplicity AND great sound, it doesn't get any better
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for simplicity AND great sound, it doesn't get any better! Well made and classic Klipsch sound. Forget the little clicker, just turn your TV speakers off and your TV or SAT remote controls the volume, mute, etc. It will crank when you want it with ease. One tip, choose your input cable, either optical or RCA, but do not leave both plugged into the unit. If you do, the unit gets confused and will not turn on automatically when you turn the TV on. It took me hours to figure that out. Once I removed the non used RCA jacks, bingo, works perfectly. Highly recommended, especially when it was going for $249!
customer_reviews.author: ResearchEverything

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to my home theater system works very well ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to my home theater system works very well when I don't feel like turning on the whole 7.1 syste always been happy with klipsch products
customer_reviews.author: Michael Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound, simplicity to set up. Great for sports, movies and music as well. Bluetooth feature works flawlessly with ipod/iphone etc.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Noble

customer_reviews.title: "It's all about that lack of bass"
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and hook up. But supprising lack of bass for its size.
customer_reviews.author: albert rosa

customer_reviews.title: Really excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent quality for the price, and the addition of Bluetooth with this model ultimately is what sold me. Very glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Matt B Lovern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, superior sound quality, great value and streamline design. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karise

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected from all my research. Very satisfied with what it has to offer for the prize. Would have given it 5 stars if it had an external sub hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Czarnecki

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound system for Home TV and easy operations
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound system for Home TV and easy operations, simple design^^, enjoy your time every night and days. You will be feel so good with great and fantastic sound.
customer_reviews.author: CHOI WOO SUNG

customer_reviews.title: Great TV speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great TV speakers...very good quality...they are not blasters..but they do work perfectly for intended use at a good price point
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Stanley Cavers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Took back a Bose Solo prior to getting the Klipsch. The Klipsch is head and shoulders above the Bose. The only downside is the inputs. It has the digital audio and analog RCA plugs. My television only had a coaxial digital output. This required me to get an adapter. Other than that, it works amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bridges

customer_reviews.title: It is really easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: It is really easy to setup. Took less than five minutes. Could use a bit more base but overall great sound. I wish I had done this long ago. Makes watching TV much better.
customer_reviews.author: John Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly crisp music!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge Klipsch supporter and this does not disappoint. It hooks up easily to my TV and the Bluetooth function is as any other one is. What's interesting is that I didn't realize how amazing the sound quality is until I started playing music. Of course, it makes my movies more dramatic, but the songs that come out are so crisp. I sat in front of it, just listening to music for half an hour and could hear background instruments that I'd never picked up on before. It's a hefty piece of equipment, but if you want to get a quality soundbar without paying absurd amounts of money, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: M. Y.

product_meta.title: Klipsch SB 120 TV Sound System with Bluetooth Wireless Technology (Black)
product_meta.description: The SB 120 sound base is a more compact alternative to both multiple speaker and conventional soundbar systems, designed as a single cabinet, single connection, sound solution that rest's underneath your TV on a stand, shelf, dresser or countertop. Built to redefine the home theater experience, the SB 120 combines legendary Klipsch horn-loaded technology with separate midrange drivers and dual subwoofers for dynamic, full-range sound. TV shows, movies and gaming all sound much more lifelike with extended dialogue clarity. The SB 120 includes Bluetooth wireless technology, allowing it to double as a premium music playback device with simple wireless streaming of your favorite music from your compatible stored music devices. Dolby Digital decoding assures for a quick, simple setup to almost any flat-panel TV. Ease-of-use is maintained with an included remote control or uncomplicated programmability to most existing TV remotes. Supports TVs weighing up to 100 lbs.
feature_bullets: Compact, high-performance, pedestal-style 2.1 system with Bluetooth wireless technology
Exclusive Klipsch horn-loaded technology combined with dual, built-in subwoofers for dynamic, room-filling sound
Bluetooth wireless technology for high-quality music streaming from smartphones, portable music players and computers
Dolby Digital decoding for quick, one-connection setup with most TV's
Supports TVs weighing up to 100 lbs.
